Configuration.Name: L1=L2=8m_central_apx5
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.064 config.det = 7200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g5' config.apx = -23 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 90.1172 config.beamcenterz = 95.8987 config.drive()
